column4: how mature is the apt-get upgrade method when upgrading distro?
if they exist in your currently active repos for the new version of Ubuntu, they will be upgraded
do the monodevelop packages on LP say that 1.9.2 is released for Intrepid?
the latest packages on the developer site will not tell you what to expect in Ubuntu's repos.
oh wait, that was mono1.9 not monodevelop
what do you *need* in this newer package?
well, it has code completion for one thing
This new feature is so imprtant to my workflow I am willing to risk the stability and usability of my system. true?
no, for probably asking obvious questiosn
sudo apt-get update && apt-cache show monodevelop
yeah looks like only 1.0 is available
